snippet.title: ModNation™ Racers Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Create your own track and RACE!  ModNation Racers kicks off with a sweet trailer that shows that in a ModNation race, every lap is an adventure.

ModNation Racers is available now on you PS3 and PSP systems.

A Creative Twist on Classic Kart Racing!

ModNation™ Racers is a next generation kart racer that empowers the player to personalize their entire race.  Shoot, boost & drift your way to the finish line both offline and online, then create your own racing experiences with the same tools used by the development team.  Its Kart Racing for a New Generation!

Join the Nation at www.ModNation.com to get the latest news and special offers.

ModNation is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.  (c) 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment LLC.
